titles.title: Relating to the period during which certain retail dealer occupational taxes may be assessed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Limits assessments of underpayments with respect to taxable periods beginning before July 1, 1985, in connection with the annual occupational tax on retail liquor and beer dealers. Abates assessments and refunds overpayments of any post-1987 tax.
